Class StockRow

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.ui.table.TableRow.AbstractStockRow
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.ui.table.TableRow.StockRow
public class StockRow extends AbstractStockRow
View-model for a stock table row. Extends AbstractStockRow to expose common stock properties.
